data.text:

Over the course of the next 11 days, the Oklahoma City Thunder will play at least five games in Las Vegas at NBA Summer League

The Oklahoma City Thunder went 2-1 in Salt Lake City, as the first of two NBA Summer League events took place.

The Oklahoma City Thunder kick off their NBA Summer League circuit in Salt Lake City tonight. What do you need to know going into this event?

OKC Thunder Summer League Roster And Full Two-Event Schedule Finalized

The Oklahoma City Thunder kick off NBA Summer League on Monday with a fresh roster released ahead of the first of two events on the circuit.

Thunder Makes First Major Free Agency Splash In OKC History

For the first time in the Oklahoma City Thunder's history, the team was a major player in free agency after acquiring Isaiah Hartenstein.

OKC Thunder’s Free Agency Strategy Remains Consistent Following 2024 NBA Draft

Although the Oklahoma City Thunder added three players to the roster this week, the franchise's approach to free agency should not change.

Oklahoma City Doubles Down On Round One Of 2024 NBA Draft With Dillon Jones Trade

Although the Oklahoma City Thunder only entered the 2024 NBA Draft with one pick, the team landed two players when it was all said and done.

Thunder Takes High Upside Swing In 2024 NBA Draft With Nikola Topic

With the No. 12 pick in the 2024 NBA Draft, the Oklahoma City Thunder opted to take Serbian guard Nikola Topic.

OKC Thunder 2024 NBA Draft Preview

The 2024 NBA Draft is officially here, meaning the Oklahoma City Thunder have a decision to make with the No. 12 overall pick.

Oklahoma City Makes Win-Now Move In Swap Of Josh Giddey For Alex Caruso

In the first big move of the offseason, the Oklahoma City Thunder swapped Josh Giddey for Alex Caruso in a trade with the Chicago Bulls.

Internal Development Could Be Simple Path To OKC Thunder Taking Next Step

While the Oklahoma City Thunder will explore roster upgrades in the draft, free agency and trade market, internal development is equally as important this offseason.
